member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.TokenCloudCredentials
member.summary: Class for token based credentials associated with a particular subscription.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.SubscriptionCloudCredentials
member.summary: Base class for credentials associated with a particular subscription.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.SubscriptionCloudCredentials.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets subscription ID which uniquely identifies Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every call that you make to the Service Management API.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with subscription ID.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class without subscription ID.

member.summary: Attempt to create token credentials from a collection of settings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.TokenCloudCredentials.ProcessHttpRequestAsync(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Apply the credentials to the HTTP request.
member.returns: Task that will complete when processing has completed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.TokenCloudCredentials.SubscriptionId
member.summary: Gets subscription ID which uniquely identifies Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every call that you make to the Service Management API.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.TokenCloudCredentials.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets secure token used to authenticate against Microsoft Azure API. No anonymous requests are allowed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.AzureOperationResponse
member.summary: A standard service response including an HTTP status code and request ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.AzureOperationResponse.RequestId
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that uniquely identifies a request made against the service.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatus
member.summary: The status of the asynchronous request.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatus.InProgress
member.summary: The asynchronous request is in progress.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatus.Succeeded
member.summary: The asynchronous request succeeded.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatus.Failed
member.summary: The asynchronous request failed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse
member.summary: The response body contains the status of the specified asynchronous operation, indicating whether it has succeeded, is i progress, or has failed. Note that this status is distinct from the HTTP status code returned for the Get Operation Status operation itself. If the asynchronous operation succeeded, the response body includes the HTTP status code for the successful request. If the asynchronous operation failed, the response body includes the HTTP status code for the failed request, and also includes error information regarding the failure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.Error
member.summary: If the asynchronous operation failed, the response body includes the HTTP status code for the failed request, and also includes error information regarding the failure.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.HttpStatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP status code for the asynchronous request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.Id
member.summary: The request ID of the asynchronous request. This value is returned in the x-ms-request-id response header of the asynchronous request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.Status
member.summary: The status of the asynchronous request.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.ErrorDetails
member.summary: If the asynchronous operation failed, the response body includes the HTTP status code for the failed request, and also includes error information regarding the failure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.ErrorDetails.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ErrorDetails class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.ErrorDetails.Code
member.summary: The management service error code returned if the asynchronous request failed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.OperationStatusResponse.ErrorDetails.Message
member.summary: The management service error message returned if the asynchronous request failed.

member.summary: Expression visitor class that generates OData style $filter parameter.

member.summary: Visits binary expression like ==, &&, >, etc.

member.summary: Visits binary expression !foo.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.VisitConditional(System.Linq.Expressions.ConditionalExpression)
member.summary: Visits conditional expression foo == true ? bar : fee. Throws NotSupportedException.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.VisitNew(System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression)
member.summary: Visits new object expression like new DateTime().

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.VisitConstant(System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression)
member.summary: Visits constants like 'a' or 123.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.VisitMember(System.Linq.Expressions.MemberExpression)
member.summary: Visits object members like p.Foo or dateTime.Hour.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.VisitMethodCall(System.Linq.Expressions.MethodCallExpression)
member.summary: Visits method calls like Contains, StartsWith, etc. Methods that are not supported will throw an exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Common.OData.UrlExpressionVisitor.closeUnaryBooleanOperator
member.summary: Appends 'eq true' to Boolean unary operators.

member.summary: Helper method to print constant.

member.summary: Helper method to generate property name.

member.summary: Helper method to retrieve format from the FilterParameterAttribute.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ArgumentCannotBeEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value cannot be empty. Parameter name: {0}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ArgumentCannotBeGreaterThanBaseline
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument {0} cannot be greater than its ceiling value of {1}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument {0} cannot be initialized with a negative value..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {3} Failed to create {0} from connection settings {1} = "{2}"..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No connection settings found for type {0}. Enable tracing for more information..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter {0} is required..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Default retry strategy for technology {0}, named '{1}', is not defined..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.DefaultRetryStrategyNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Default retry strategy for technology {0} was not not defined, and there is no overall default strategy..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ExceptionRetryHandlerMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Retry handler is not present in the HttpClient handler stack..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ExceptionRetryManagerAlreadySet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The RetryManager is already set..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ExceptionRetryManagerNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The default RetryManager has not been set. Set it by invoking the RetryManager.SetDefault static method, or if you are using declarative configuration, you can invoke the RetryPolicyFactory.CreateDefault() method to automatically create the retry manager from the configuration file..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.ResponseStatusCodeError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Response status code indicates server error: {0} ({1})..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.RetryLimitExceeded
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The action has exceeded its defined retry limit..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.RetryStrategyNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The retry strategy with name '{0}' cannot be found..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.StringCannotBeEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified string argument {0} must not be empty..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.TaskCannotBeNull
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument '{0}' cannot return a null task when invoked..

member.name: P:Microsoft.Azure.Common.Properties.Resources.TaskMustBeScheduled
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The specified argument '{0}' must return a scheduled task (also known as "hot" task) when invoked..
